name: Gift of Arthas
tooltip:
Gift of Arthas
Item Level 48
Requires Level 38
Use: Increases resistance to shadow by 10.  If an enemy strikes the imbiber, the attacker has a 30% chance of being inflicted with disease that increases their damage taken by 8 for 3 min.  Lasts for 30 min. (3 Sec Cooldown)
Max Stack: 5
Sell Price: 2 50
